creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
-liconv can end up in APRUTIL_EXPORT_LIBS, but this var is not AC_SUBST'ed nor used in Makefile.in.

For me, make check fails because neither testall nor libapr links with iconv.

Attached patch works for me and looks to make it more like when APU was separate.

creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 26891
add APRUITL_EXPORT_LIBS to Makefile.in

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text: Tag low hanging fruit in time for next 2.2.18/2.3 beta
